name: Cucina Italiana: Italian History and Culture Through Food
description: (Offered in English) This course describes the history of food in Italy, throughout the centuries. The course will chart the regional diversity of Italian food and examine various factors (early settlers, wars, migratory trends) that have shaped Italian culinary traditions. Students will also have the opportunity to investigate and explore their own (Italian or otherwise) culinary practices. As part of this course, students may have the option of participating in an international learning experience that will have an additional cost and application process. [24L]
